mapper.select: select rc.* ,com.com_name,com.com_addr,com.com_sec, comm.comm_ctx ,res.res_title from resume_contect rc inner join company com on rc.com_id=com.com_id inner join resume res on rc.user_id=res.user_id and rc.res_code=res.res_code inner join comm on com.com_sec=comm.sub_cat where rc.user_id=#{mbid} and comm.main_cat='050' order by rc.res_date desc
